code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  findSpecialInteger ( vector < int >&  arr )  {   const  int  n  =  arr . size ();   const  int  quarter  =  n  /  4 ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n  -  quarter ;  ++ i )   if  ( arr [ i ]  ==  arr [ i  +  quarter ])   return  arr [ i ];   throw ;   }  };
